Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: I bet Orville won't even let you leave!

Nodes.name: Orville
Nodes.text: Well, actually, if Tom wants to leave he can leave. I'm sorry Isabelle.

Nodes.name: Orville
Nodes.text: However, it looks like we have some storms rolling in, so it's going to be a while for the next plane to come in.

Nodes.name: Isabelle
Nodes.text: What are the odds? I'm sure it will give Tom some more time to think things over now.
